mapper.insert: INSERT INTO find_good (user_id, user_name, goods_bigkind, goods_smallkind, goods_postscrit, goods_contact, goods_contact_way, file_path, publish_category) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{goodsBigkind}, #{goodsSmallkind}, #{goodsPostscrit}, #{goodsContact}, #{goodsContact_way}, #{filePath}, #{publishCategory})
